channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republicans flip open House seat in Michigan with Tom Barrett's win
item.description: House Republicans earned their first election pick-up early Wednesday as they flipped an open House seat in Michigan.

item.title: Britain’s foreign affairs secretary congratulates Donald Trump’s ‘victory’—years after calling him a ‘racist KKK and Nazi sympathiser’
item.description: In 2019, David Lammy called Trump a “deluded, dishonest, xenophobic, narcissistic” and “no friend of Britain.”

item.title: GOP Rep. Marcus Molinaro loses reelection to Democrat Josh Riley

item.title: Republican Montana Rep. Ryan Zinke wins re-election in state's 1st Congressional District
